ygData.subject: Re: Megatron vs. Galvatron
ygData.msgSnippet: The new dark bot dropped to the ground with a bang. A crater around his feet forming. Sending a small shockwave. Shaking he stands up in beast mode. Galvatrons

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

 The new dark bot dropped to the ground with a bang. A crater around his feet 
forming. Sending a small shockwave. Shaking he stands up in beast mode. 
Galvatrons thoughts were concentrated on the right one. He looked around. He 
felt his and Megatron as one. He sent a telepathic voice to Megatron. "We are 
one, no more hatred or sorrow is in my spark...our spark for you anymore. 
Shall we join as one and win the Beast Wars?"

--part1_185.e421c8b.2ab2513c_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Sending a small shockwave. Shaking he stands up in beast mode. Galvatrons thoughts were concentrated on the right one. He looked around. He felt his and Megatron as one. He sent a telepathic voice to Megatron. "We are one, no more hatred or sorrow is in my spark...our spark for you anymore. Shall we join as one and win the Beast Wars?"</FONT></HTML>

--part1_185.e421c8b.2ab2513c_boundary--
